definition: fortune as unpredictable as the weather, every day may bring fortune or calamity (idiom); sth unexpected may happen at any moment
pinyin: tian1 you3 bu4 ce4 feng1 yun2 , ren2 you3 dan4 xi1 huo4 fu2
containing_words.word: 天有不测风云，人有旦夕祸福

definition: beset by a series of mishaps (idiom)

sentences.english: I have kept a reserve fund in case of accidents.
sentences.chinese: 我已筹备了一笔准备基金以防不测。

sentences.english: Although the sun was shining the other day, my father took the umbrella with him to be on the safe side.
sentences.chinese: 虽然那天阳光明媚，我父亲还是带上了雨伞以防不测。

sentences.english: Yang Ming to find biochemical materials lost, he was.
sentences.chinese: 杨明去寻找丢失的生化材料，他险遭不测。

sentences.english: Shit happens, especially when a newbie is "trying his best".
sentences.chinese: 天有不测风云，尤其是个新手在“尽力而为”的时候。

sentences.english: LinXu soon signed with the contract, let NiuZhenSheng NiuZhenSheng some accidents.
sentences.chinese: 林旭很快就签了跟牛振声的合同，让牛振声有些不测。

sentences.english: The Bai Ren with heart grey cold meaning encounters accident one after another.
sentences.chinese: 心灰意冷的伯仁接连遭遇不测。

sentences.english: At that time the king called ZuYi, days of the contingency, made him very upset.
sentences.chinese: 那时的国君叫祖乙，天时风云的不测，使他很苦恼。

sentences.english: On the other hand, relatively few people have had badexperiences with Apple.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，相对较少的人在使用苹果时惨遭不测。

sentences.english: It could put it in the bank and save it for a rainy day.
sentences.chinese: 公司可以将这笔钱存到银行，以防范天有不测风云。

sentences.english: In such an eventuality, full fee shall be refunded to the student.
sentences.chinese: 在这样的不测，全费应退还给学生。

sentences.english: Inom confident thtowards the dentist will deny the confidentiing animing incident.
sentences.chinese: 我确信牙医会否定那个诡秘的不测事项。

sentences.english: So, before you go on driving licenses to check, in case of accidents.
sentences.chinese: 因此，出行前必须对驾驶证照进行检查，以防不测。

sentences.english: Do not allow parking in the traffic rules in place to reverse in case of emergency.
sentences.chinese: 不要在交通规则中不允许倒车的地方倒车以防不测。

sentences.english: In fact, I am very well prepared for eventualities in myself.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，我很为自己的不测的事做了准备。

sentences.english: Never expecting an ambush on the road, he had a narrow escape.
sentences.chinese: 没想到路上居然设有埋伏，他险遭不测。

sentences.english: She contributed to the collective fund with an open heart.
sentences.chinese: 工厂已筹备了一笔集体基金以防不测。

definition: hard to say/can't guarantee/difficult to protect/difficult to preserve
